tool_description: Analyzes detailed funder profiles including funding patterns, preferences, success rates, and strategic priorities to inform application strategy.

funder_name.description: Name of the funding organization or foundation

analysis_depth.description: Level of analysis detail (basic, comprehensive, strategic)

years_history.description: Number of years of funding history to analyze (1-10)

error_messages: Funder not found: The specified funder_name does not exist in available databases.
Invalid analysis depth: Must be one of 'basic', 'comprehensive', 'strategic'.
Invalid years range: years_history must be between 1 and 10.
Insufficient data: Not enough historical data available for meaningful analysis.
Access restricted: Some funder information may be restricted or unavailable.
usage: Provide the funder_name as required parameter. Optionally specify analysis_depth and years_history for historical analysis scope. The tool returns comprehensive funder insights and strategic recommendations.

funder_summary.description: Overview of the funder's mission, focus areas, and key characteristics

funding_priorities.description: Current strategic priorities and preferred funding areas

average_grant_size.description: Average grant amount awarded by this funder

success_rate.description: Historical application success rate as a percentage

preferred_organization_types.description: Types of organizations this funder typically supports

application_tips.description: Strategic recommendations for approaching this funder

key_staff.description: Names and titles of key decision-makers and program officers

recent_awards.description: Examples of recently funded projects or organizations
